UnsecuredDebt.label: Unsecured Debt
UnsecuredDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

DeferredCompensationSharebasedArrangemen.label: Deferred Compensation Share-based Arrangements, Liability, Current and Noncurrent
DeferredCompensationSharebasedArrangemen.description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for stock option plans and other equity-based compensation arrangements.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForInSecuritiesSoldU.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) in Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
ProceedsFromPaymentsForInSecuritiesSoldU.description: The cash flow from investments sold under the agreement to repurchase such investment.

PaymentsForSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgree.label: Payments for Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
PaymentsForSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgree.description: The cash outflow associated with agreements to purchase and then resell securities to counterparties (reverse repurchase agreements).

ProceedsFromSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgre.label: Proceeds from Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
ProceedsFromSecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgre.description: The cash inflow associated with agreements to purchase and then resell securities to counterparties (reverse repurchase agreements).

OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer to Held-to-Maturity, Adjustment from AOCI for Amortization of Gain (Loss), after Tax
OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.description: Amount, after tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

ProceedsFromPaymentsForSecuritiesPurchas.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
ProceedsFromPaymentsForSecuritiesPurchas.description: The net cash flow from purchases followed by sales of securities under terms of reverse repurchase agreements.

DebtSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.label: Debt Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGainLoss.label: Debt Securities, Trading, Realized Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

AssetsSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseInt.label: Assets Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Interest Rate
AssetsSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseInt.description: Interest rate on the amount to be repaid to the counterparty to the repurchase agreement when the carrying amount (or market value, if higher than the carrying amount) of securities or other assets sold under the repurchase agreement exceeds 10 percent of total assets.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGain.label: Debt Securities, Trading, Realized Gain
DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGain.description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).
